title: Lasagne made from scratch
ingredients: ['1 pack lasagne sheets', '150 to 250g grated cheese', 'Meat sauce', 'olive oil, as needed', '1 red onion, chopped', '400 to 500g good quality beef mince', '500ml beef stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 to 3 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 good dash browning liquid, such as Crosse & Blackwell', '1 good squeeze tomato ketchup (optional)', '1 good squeeze brown sauce (optional)', 'White sauce', '50g butter', '50g plain flour', '600ml milk', 'salt and pepper to taste']
